sentences.en: ‘I’ve explained that already,’ Rod said shortly.
sentences.cn: “那个问题我已经解释过了。”罗德不耐烦地说。

sentences.en: A thirty-nine-year-old competitor collapsed half-way through the marathon and died shortly afterwards.
sentences.cn: 一名39岁的马拉松参赛者跑到一半时瘫倒在地，没过多久就死了。

sentences.en: He arrived with a police escort shortly before half past nine.
sentences.cn: 快到9点半的时候，他在一名警察的护送下到达了。

sentences.en: He reached Cambridge shortly before three o'clock.
sentences.cn: 他快到3点的时候抵达了剑桥。

sentences.en: He will shortly become the fulcrum of the England team.
sentences.cn: 他不久就会成为英格兰队的支柱。

sentences.en: Julie was suspended from her job shortly after the incident.
sentences.cn: 出事后不久，朱莉就被停职了。

sentences.en: Ms Jones will be back shortly.
sentences.cn: 琼斯女士很快就会回来。

sentences.en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentences.cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentences.en: Political observers believe that a new cabinet may be formed shortly.
sentences.cn: 政治观察家认为新内阁可能很快就会组建。

sentences.en: Prepare the garnishes shortly before you are ready to serve the soup.
sentences.cn: 在快要准备上汤前再在上面加点装饰菜。

sentences.en: Shortly after moving into her apartment, she found a job.
sentences.cn: 搬进公寓不久，她就找到了份工作。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, police arrested four suspects.
sentences.cn: 之后不久，警方逮捕了4名嫌犯。

sentences.en: Shortly before Christmas, he was mysteriously taken ill.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节前不久，他突然不明原因地病倒了。

sentences.en: The rocket tumbled out of control shortly after lift-off.
sentences.cn: 发射后不久，火箭就失控坠落了。

sentences.en: The Senate is expected to pass the bill shortly.
sentences.cn: 预计参议院不久就会通过此议案。

sentences.en: The telephone call came shortly before dinnertime.
sentences.cn: 电话是在正餐快要开始时打来的。

words.tran_cn: 短的；不足的；急速的；唐突的

trans.tran_cn: 立刻，马上，简单地，扼要地，唐突地，简慢地，在即
